text: The Samaritans are a group of people who live in the Levant. Samaritans believe in the same one God of Judaism, but use only the Torah as text. There are more than 800 Samaritans.The Samaritan Update Most of them live in Holon and Nablus. == Related pages == * The Samaritan Museum == References == Archived. https://web.archive.org/web/20080512075303/http://www.jtsa.edu/prebuilt/exhib/scrips/index.shtml https://archive.today/20130626180151/http://www.jtsa.edu/prebuilt/exhib/scrips/index.shtml Category:Abrahamic religions Category:Ethnic groups in Israel Category:Ethnic groups in the Middle East Category:Religion in Israel Category:Samaritans
title: Samaritans
